info.description: This is the API for fastabiz operations.
info.title: FastaBiz API

get.description: Get a list of all deliveries
Retrieve a delivery by their ID

delete.description: Permanently deletes a delivery by their ID

put.description: When a driver accepts an order assignment, this endpoint creates the delivery record, marks the order as in-transit, sets the pickup timestamp, and marks the driver as unavailable. Only callable by authenticated drivers.
put.summary: Accept order assignment and create delivery

parameters.description: Delivery ID (corresponds to the order assignment)
parameters.name: id

put.description: Update any delivery struct field of an existing delivery

400.description: Invalid delivery ID or request body

get.description: Get a list of all registered drivers
Retrieve a driver by their Email
Retrieve a driver by their ID

delete.description: Permanently deletes a driver by their ID

patch.description: Updates the vehicle information and current location of a driver

put.description: Updates a driver's specific field (e.g., VehicleInfo, CurrentLocation) based on driver ID

400.description: Invalid driver ID or request body

get.description: Get a list of all feedbacks

post.description: Create a new feedback with order_id, customer_id, etc.

get.description: Retrieve a feedback by their ID
Get all invites that are pending
Fetch an invite using a token

post.description: Create a new invite for a user

get.description: Get all notifications belonging to a user (optionally filtered by status)
Get a list of notifications not yet sent

post.description: Create a new notification with user_id, message, etc.

patch.description: Mark all unread notifications for a given user ID as "read"
patch.summary: Mark all user notifications as read

500.description: Failed to mark notifications as read

patch.description: Update notification status to "read" by ID
patch.summary: Mark a single notification as read
Update a notification's status (e.g. mark as sent or read)

get.description: Get a list of all orders

post.description: Assign nearest available drivers to pending orders

get.description: Fetch order(s) using Customer ID
Fetch a single order using UUID

post.description: Creates an order and returns IDs of created orders
Creates pending orders and returns IDs

delete.description: Permanently deletes an order by their ID

put.description: Update any order struct field of an existing order

400.description: Invalid order ID or request body

get.description: Get a list of all payments

post.description: Register new payment with order_id, amount, etc.

get.description: Fetch a single payment using payment ID
Fetch payment(s) using Order ID
Retrieves a product by its ID, including images, options, and variants.

post.description: Creates a new product for a merchant, including optional images, options, and variants.
Adds an image to a product. Optionally marks it as the primary image.

patch.description: Updates the display order of product images using an ordered list of image IDs.

delete.description: Deletes a product image by its ID.

patch.description: Updates price for a product without variants (product_inventory table).

400.description: Invalid request body or invalid product input

patch.description: Updates stock for a product without variants (product_inventory table).

400.description: Invalid request body or invalid product input

post.description: Adds a new option name (e.g. Size, Color) to a product.
Adds values to an existing product option (e.g. Red, Large).

delete.description: Deletes a value from a product option.
Deletes an option name from a product.

post.description: Creates a purchasable variant for a product based on option values.

404.description: Product or option values not found

patch.description: Updates the price of a product variant.
Updates the stock quantity of a product variant.

delete.description: Permanently deletes a product by its ID.

patch.description: Updates the core details of a product (name, description, category).

get.description: Returns all options and their values for a given product
Retrieves all products belonging to a specific store.

post.description: Register a new user with name, email, etc.
Authenticates a user using email and password and returns a JWT token.

get.description: Returns all stores (admin view or public)
Fetch a single store by its UUID

post.description: Creates a new store for the authenticated owner

get.description: Returns all stores owned by the current user
Returns stores owned by authenticated user with limit and offset

parameters.description: Maximum number of items to return
parameters.name: limit

delete.description: Deletes a store owned by the authenticated user

get.description: Fetch summarized info about a store

put.description: Update details of a store owned by the authenticated user

get.description: Get a list of all registered users
Retrieve a user by their Email
Retrieve a user by their ID

delete.description: Permanently deletes a user by their ID

patch.description: Updates only the phone number of a driver (commonly used after onboarding)

put.description: Verifies the user's current password and updates it to a new password

400.description: Invalid user ID or request body

patch.description: Updates the user's name, email, and/or phone number. Partial updates allowed.
Updates the status (e.g., active, inactive, suspended) of a specific user.

put.description: Updates a user's specific field (e.g., FullName, Email) based on user ID

400.description: Invalid user ID or request body

images.description: Stored as JSON/JSONB array in DB
